name: Conjure Weapon
description: The caster touches one creature and calls forth a magical weapon directly into that creature's hands for 5 to 10 rounds.  The weapon cannot be removed until it disappears when the spell duration expires.  The caster may select from a variety of weapons, with the weapon gaining one rank of quality for every 3 caster levels.  The weapon is magically enchanted to provide +10 to Attack.
